name: Healthier Sugar Cookie Icing
author: MakeItHealthy
summary: This icing dries hard and shiny and the colors stay bright. Choose as many different food colorings as you desire.
directions: Combine white sugar and water in a small saucepan over medium heat, simmering until dissolved and a sugar syrup is created, about 5 minutes
Stir together confectioner's sugar and milk in a small bowl until smooth
Beat in almond extract and 2 teaspoons of sugar syrup until icing is smooth and glossy
If icing is too thick, add more sugar syrup
Optional: Divide icing into separate bowls and add food colorings to each to desired intensity
Dip cookies or paint them with a brush
